Product FAQ

Is this air fryer big enough for a family?

It lists a capacity of 8 qt (two 4-qt baskets), which can work for family-size portions depending on what you cook.

How well does this air fryer crisp food?

It includes Air fry, roast, reheat, dehydrate, so you can adjust settings to target crisping.

Does it take up a lot of counter space?

It has a large footprint, so plan for extra counter space.

Does it have dual zones?

It offers Dual independent baskets, letting you cook two foods separately.

Are the controls easy to use?

Controls are sync and match cook, keeping operation straightforward.
